review_data.title: Fabulous Zurich style veal
review_data.content: The place is really oldish , service of an incredible arrogance and snobish old style maitre d'hotel... But once you order your Emincé de veau a la Zurichoise you will be enchanted. Nice selection of wine, we combined it with a sardinian delight " Korem"....More

review_data.title: Österreichische Gastfreundschaft

review_data.title: Dinner with friends.
review_data.content: Nice intimate dining place, Food portion was big enough so don't over order. Price is very expensive.

review_data.title: Old fashioned decor with a touch of modern cuisine
review_data.content: I ate a late brunch here with some friends and I was suprised by the old fashioned decore but very plesant staff and atmosphere. This was the most expensive lunch I had while in Zurich, but I can not say that it was not worth...More

review_data.title: Charming service, lovely food
review_data.content: There is an excellent range of food on the menu. The meals are beautifully presented and nothing is too much trouble for the wait staff who are both friendly and professional.

review_data.title: "SUPERB-Hervorragendes Essen mit ausgezeichnetem Service"
review_data.content: Ganz großes Lob an den Küchenchef Martin Fencz und dem gesamten Team!! Haben nur sehr kompetente und freundliche Gesichter angetroffen!!!

review_data.title: Correct but not outstanding
review_data.content: Pleasant service and decor. Nice touches like the complimentary note pad. Tasty amuse-bouche and fresh ingredients throughout the meal. Good wine and convenient flexibility to consume by the glass at the prices per bottle. Sorry to say though, not the outstanding meal we expected after...More

review_data.title: Great Food
review_data.content: Excellent food, great service, prices very high and the ambience on the quiet side, but excellent quality.

review_data.title: Solid - but very pricey..
review_data.content: Food is good - ambience very old fashioned and dated - prices too high. Cannot recommend for people below the age of 105 - and I have no idea why this place ends up so high on TA list for Zurich...

review_data.title: Great Restaurant!
review_data.content: I spent a lovely evening with friends eating great food and enjoyed a very attentive and humorous service.

review_data.title: Another Excellent Gourmet Meal
review_data.content: Last night I had the pleasure of having another excellent meal at Restaurant La Soupiere in the Schweizerhof Hotel. The Maitre d', Helmut (Helmi) Stadlober and his team pulled out all the stops to make my evening in Zurich wonderful. I had not dined here...More

review_data.title: Great!
review_data.content: Food was excellent, as was service. English speaking staff made us feel at home. Desserts were really good.

review_data.title: A very peasant dinner
review_data.content: I had dinner with a friend and we both found everything excellent, quallity of food, service and ambiance. I have already planned a a lunch with my daughter in this very pleasant restaurant.

review_data.title: Gutes Essen, zuvorkommende Bedienung
review_data.content: Wir genossen ein Frühstück a discretion! Es war hervorragend. Lecker, frisch mit äusserst zuvorkommender Bedienung.

review_data.title: Perfektes Galadîner

review_data.title: 15JAN2013: Lunch at La Soupiere
review_data.content: We had today lunch at "La Soupiere" while at the Schweizerhof. The service was excellent and the food exquisite!! Great experience

review_data.title: Marvelous
review_data.content: It's not only because of the unique quality of its food, but above all by the charm and 'savoir faire' of the master Helmut, one soiree at La Soupiere will remain forever recorded in your memory. Absolutely recommendable.

review_data.title: Three distinct eateries
review_data.content: The Schweizerhof has three eateries; the Schweizerhof Bar, Cafe Gourmet and La Soupiere, all of which are reliably great. The bar is small and the staff attentive, with the relatively small menu having all the essentials for a night away on business (i.e. decent steak),...More

review_data.content: Liebes Scheizerhof-Team, Qualtiät der Speisen, Service und Ambiente unschlagbar - hab mich sehr gefühlt. :-) Danke Josef B.

review_data.title: Service

review_data.title: Restaurant La Soupiere

review_data.title: First Class Restaurant
review_data.content: We ate at La Soupiere while at the Schweizerhof. It was a magnificent experience. The service was impeccable and the food exquisite, if rather pricey. I had turbot with puy lentils and star anise and a pumpkin with honey sauce which was delicious and my...More

review_data.title: Das beste Frühstücksbuffet in der Schweiz
review_data.content: Liebenswerter Service und ausgezeichnete Auswahl! Der Frühstücksraum ist sehr stilvoll eingerichtet das Personal ist freundlich und gut gelaunt. Das Frühstück...More

review_data.title: Très bon

review_data.title: Amazing meal at La Soupiere
review_data.content: I recently had the pleasure of dining at La Soupiere. While the meal was rather expensive, the service was gracious and impeccable, and the food was absolutely divine. After mentioning that I was there to celebrate my birthday, the restaurant also offered the desserts gratis....More

review_data.title: Excellent Breakfast Buffet. Great value.
review_data.content: I live in Zurich. I have often had breakfast buffet there, meeting business contacts before the working day. The buffet breakfast is excellent and good value. Hotel restaurant is conveniently situated in the business area. Excellent public transport (close to main railway terminus).

review_data.title: Always a pleasure
review_data.content: Have dined here a few times now and cannot fault food, service, quality. Well worth it. Special mention to Helmie who made our evenings an absolute delight with his excellent service, his personality and attention to detail.

review_data.title: Location, location, location, superior service and attention to detail
review_data.content: Recently we stayed at the Hotel Schweizerhof and didn't want to leave. Walking out from the foyer and into the Bahnhoff area took all of 2 minutes and we were immersed in all things Swiss. Staying in was even better!

review_data.title: Excellente qualité, service très soigné!! (Prix en conséquence)
